title: STARE Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster
text: stared; staring 1 : to look fixedly often with wide-open eyes He just sat and stared out the window. â€”often used with atThey stared at the scene in disbelief. 2 : to show oneself conspicuously The error stared from the page. 3 1 : to have an effect on by staring 2 : to look at with a searching or earnest gaze stared him up and down starer noun see also stare one in the face Love words?
